actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment, Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Environment, Credit and Rural Development

official_title: To amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to develop programs to encourage source-separated composting at homes, schools, and workplaces, and on farms.

summary.text: National Composting Act of 1994 - Amends the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to appoint a national composting coordinator to develop source-separated composting programs, guidelines, and related activities. Authorizes appropriations. Directs the Secretary to include compost usage as a conservation practice eligible for Federal cost sharing.

titles.title: To amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to develop programs to encourage source-separated composting at homes, schools, and workplaces, and on farms.
